EXTRACTED VALUE: Lost Odyssey doesn't break the JRPG mold, but it does fill it out quite nicely with a strong story and great characters.
The massively open online racing idea works, but critical portions of the racing and the game itself prevent this from being the next big thing.
Tony Hawk's Project 8 needed to be absolutely mind-blowing for me to catch skate fever once again, and sadly, it just isn’t that spectacular... yet.
It’s by no means better than the original, but it does produce a similar play through of exhilaration that’ll have you on the edge of your seat.
While single player offers enough to keep things new, the same cannot be said for multiplayer.
